Well I swapped in sparky for balloon and switched minim horde to minions. Went on a 5 game win streak to 3062. The biggest thing I do differently is try to drop sparky for defense and giant in front of it on the counter. If no hog, Tombstone has proven useful during the push to create distractions.

I've been practicing your deck and it's a lot of fun to play. Nice to get away from the hog/RG meta. Couple questions.
